info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 5:15PM EDT until August 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Belmont County in east central Ohio... West central Washington County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Ohio County in northern West Virginia... Brooke County in northern West Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 515 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tiltonsville, or near Clearview, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Martins Ferry, Warwood, West Liberty, Clearview, Valley Grove, Tiltonsville, Yorkville, Bethany, Dillonvale, Beech Bottom, and Mount Pleasant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
